Name: Mahjong Worlds
About the game: Take a break with Mahjong Worlds! Mahjong Worlds is a recreation of the classic mahjong solitaire in the 3D. The game features classic and 3D levels (formations) in beautiful and relaxing scenes. Features: 4 beautiful scenes and additional low poly scene 20 levels of different sizes 5 stunning suits Configurable ambient settings
